trans-unit.source: Represents controls that act as scrollable containers for a collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: 表示充当子元素的集合的可滚动容器的控件。

trans-unit.source: The children of this element support <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollItemPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此元素支持的子级<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollItemPattern"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for examples of controls that may implement this control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[UI 自动化客户端的控件模式映射](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)有关的可能实现此控件模式的控件示例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取已缓存[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]参数的属性值<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: 缓存的属性值必须已以前请求过使用一种<xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.Current%2A> to get the current value of a property.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.Current%2A>来获取属性的当前值。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: 有关可用的属性和其使用的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含已缓存的结构[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]的控件模式的属性值。

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 请求的属性不在缓存中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]参数的属性值<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: 此模式必须从<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>与<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>以获取当前值的引用。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>获得使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>，它只包含已缓存数据，并尝试获取的任何属性的当前值引发异常。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.Cached%2A>若要获取的缓存的值指定的属性，这是以前使用一种<xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.Cached%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: 有关可用的属性和其使用的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 结构，它包含当前[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]的控件模式的属性值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation.HorizontallyScrollable*> property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation.HorizontallyScrollable*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation.HorizontallyScrollable*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation.HorizontalScrollPercent*> property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation.HorizontalScrollPercent*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation.HorizontalScrollPercent*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation.HorizontalViewSize*> property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation.HorizontalViewSize*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation.HorizontalViewSize*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that scrolling should not be performed.
trans-unit.target: 指定滚动应该不会执行。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: The value -1 can be substituted for the NoScroll field.
trans-unit.target: 可以为 NoScroll 字段替换值-1。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern"></xref>控件模式。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: 模式标识符传递给方法，例如，<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>若要检索从指定的<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>感兴趣的控件模式</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the visible region of the content area horizontally and vertically.
trans-unit.target: 水平和垂直滚动内容区域的可见区域。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal increment specific to the control.
trans-unit.target: 特定于控件的水平增量。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.NoScroll"></xref> should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.NoScroll"></xref>如果无法在此方向上滚动控件，应将中传递。

trans-unit.source: The vertical increment specific to the control.
trans-unit.target: 特定于控件的垂直增量。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.NoScroll"></xref> should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.NoScroll"></xref>如果无法在此方向上滚动控件，应将中传递。

trans-unit.source: A control supports <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount"></xref> values exclusively for horizontal or vertical scrolling but a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount"></xref> value is passed in.
trans-unit.target: 控件支持<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount"></xref>仅对水平或垂直滚动的值但<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount"></xref>中传递值。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to scroll in an unsupported direction.
trans-unit.target: 尝试在不受支持的方向上滚动。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the currently visible region of the content area, horizontally, the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 水平滚动内容区域的当前可见区域指定<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount"></xref> increment specific to the control.
trans-unit.target: 水平<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount"></xref>增量特定于控件。

trans-unit.source: If a control supports <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount"></xref> values exclusively for horizontal or vertical scrolling but a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount"></xref> value is passed in.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件支持<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount"></xref>仅对水平或垂直滚动的值但<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount"></xref>中传递值。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to scroll in an unsupported direction.
trans-unit.target: 尝试在不受支持的方向上滚动。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the currently visible region of the content area, vertically, the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 垂直滚动内容区域的当前可见区域指定<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount"></xref> increment specific to the control.
trans-unit.target: 垂直<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount"></xref>增量特定于控件。

trans-unit.source: If a control supports <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount"></xref> values exclusively for horizontal or vertical scrolling but a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount"></xref> value is passed in.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件支持<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount"></xref>仅对水平或垂直滚动的值但<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount"></xref>中传递值。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to scroll in an unsupported direction.
trans-unit.target: 尝试在不受支持的方向上滚动。

trans-unit.source: Sets the horizontal and/or vertical scroll position as a percentage of the total content area within the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 设置水平和/或垂直滚动位置内总内容区域的百分比<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is only useful when the content area of the control is larger than the visible region.
trans-unit.target: 大于的可见区域的内容区域的控件时，此方法才有用。

trans-unit.source: Passing in the value <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers.NoScroll> indicates that there is no scrolling in the specified direction.
trans-unit.target: 传递的值中<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers.NoScroll>指示是否有不滚动按指定的方向。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers.NoScroll>

trans-unit.source: The percentage of the total horizontal content area.
trans-unit.target: 总水平内容区域的百分比。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.NoScroll"></xref> should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.NoScroll"></xref>如果无法在此方向上滚动控件，应将中传递。

trans-unit.source: The percentage of the total vertical content area.
trans-unit.target: 总垂直内容区域的百分比。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.NoScroll"></xref> should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.NoScroll"></xref>如果无法在此方向上滚动控件，应将中传递。

trans-unit.source: A value that cannot be converted to a double is passed in.
trans-unit.target: 传入一个值，不能转换为双精度值。

trans-unit.source: A value greater than 100 or less than 0 is passed in (except -1, which is equivalent to <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.NoScroll"></xref>).
trans-unit.target: 在传入大于 100 或小于 0 的值 (-1 除外，这等同于<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.NoScroll"> </xref>)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation.HorizontalScrollPercent*> and <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation.VerticalScrollPercent*> values are normalized to either 0% or 100%.
An attempt is made to scroll in an unsupported direction.
trans-unit.target: 尝试在不受支持的方向上滚动。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation.VerticallyScrollable*> property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation.VerticallyScrollable*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation.VerticallyScrollable*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation.VerticalScrollPercent*> property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation.VerticalScrollPercent*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation.VerticalScrollPercent*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation.VerticalViewSize*> property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation.VerticalViewSize*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation.VerticalViewSize*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPatternIdentifiers>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
